name: How to God
summary:
What Kind of God Will You Be?

❄️ NEW WINTER UPDATE! 💦 Behold a new god room fit for the holidays 🎁 Plus lots of bug fixes 🪲 and we’re added your most requested villager interaction… drowning 🌊

In How to God, a sandbox God Simulation game, you alone choose how to shape your world. Command your followers, experiment with alchemy, complete questlines, face-off against almighty challenges, and make the choice between good and evil. No judgement from us, of course - only you can choose How to God.

😈...
